text: @holly_cummins @Purity_Birir @hot_girl_spring @monkchips @edeandrea Damned, what a shame that you (and other women) have to deal with this kind of crap. Still, in this time and age. Thanks for talking about this. I love what you talk about, no matter what you wear (not that it would be my or anyone else's business).

author.name: Gunnar Morling
author.description: Software engineer @ Decodable 路 Ex-lead of Debezium 路 Spec lead of Bean Validation 2.0 路 Creator of JfrUnit, kcctl and MapStruct 路 Java Champion 路
